item.title: Why I Switched from Testing to Development After 9 Years
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article documents my experience and insights from transitioning from testing to development. I share my learning and work arrangements during paternity leave, including reading books, participating in open-source projects, and physical exercise, emphasizing how to maintain learning and growth while caring for a family.
